attributes.title: CAN GUYS QUEEF? - #69
attributes.caption: New games, new teams, same chance we might get canceled before the end of the season. LET'S DO THIS!
attributes.description: New games, new teams, same chance we might get canceled before the end of the season. LET'S DO THIS! This episode originally aired on October 7, 2016 and is sponsored by Casper and Dollar Shave Club

attributes.title: The Anti-Shocker #70
attributes.caption: This episode is all about learning new things.
attributes.description: This episode is all about learning new things. How to ruin weddings. How to ruin school assemblies. How to ruin the nerve endings in your hands due to electric shock.This episode originally aired October 13, 2016 and is sponsored by Kit Kat and MVMT

attributes.title: Nasty Hombres - #71
attributes.caption: ​ Some days you wake up and you're in a good mood. Some days you wake up feeling rotten. And some days you a straight up nasty hombre. Guess what today is?
attributes.description: Some days you wake up and you're in a good mood. Some days you wake up feeling rotten. And some days you a straight up nasty hombre. Guess what today is? This episode originally aired October 20, 2016 and is sponsored by Battlefield 1. and Dollar Shave Club

attributes.title: Saved by a Nipple - #72
attributes.caption: Mario Bros is a time honored family-friendly franchise that is a beloved staple of the Nintendo family.
attributes.description: Mario Bros is a time honored family-friendly franchise that is a beloved staple of the Nintendo family. But, don't you kinda wanna see what Mario is packing? This episode originally aired October 27, 2016 and is sponsored by Trunk Club

attributes.title: Hotel Room Fiasco! - #73
attributes.caption: If housekeeping walks in on you naked in your hotel room listening to music you clearly have one and only one option...JUST DANCE!
attributes.description: If housekeeping walks in on you naked in your hotel room listening to music you clearly have one and only one option...JUST DANCE! This episode originally aired on October 3, 2016 and is sponsored by Dollar Shave Club and Lyft

attributes.title: I DON'T HAVE A PROBLEM! - #74
attributes.caption: ​ Miles has a cookie problem. You know it. I know it. This episode of On The Spot we confront him on it. Fair warning, when it finally happens things do get a little projectile-like.
attributes.description: Miles has a cookie problem. You know it. I know it. This episode of On The Spot we confront him on it. Fair warning, when it finally happens things do get a little projectile-like. This episode originally aired November 11, 2016 and is sponsored by NatureBox and Trunk Club

attributes.title: Did I Make You Gay? - #75
attributes.caption: On The Spot is not conversion therapy. On The Spot is immersion therapy. Viewers beware.
attributes.description: On The Spot is not conversion therapy. On The Spot is immersion therapy. Viewers beware. This episode originally aired November 17, 2016 and is sponsored by Dollar Shave Club MVMT Watches

attributes.title: Forever Alone - On The Spot: A Thanksgiving Special
attributes.caption: The holidays are a time to reflect upon the year and the people who have filled it with laughter, love and joy. Since none of those have to do with On The Spot, check out some of our favorite moments from this season so far.
attributes.description: The holidays are a time to reflect upon the year and the people who have filled it with laughter, love and joy. Since none of those have to do with On The Spot, check out some of our favorite moments from this season so far.Sponsored by DIFF Eyewear and MVMT Watches

attributes.title: Misogynist Santa - #77
attributes.caption: This week Jeremy hangs a wreath on his genitals.
attributes.description: This week Jeremy hangs a wreath on his genitals, Maggie learns about My Little Pony and everyone finds out the truth behind Santa Claus. This episode originally aired December 1, 2016 and is sponsored by Casper and MVMT Watches

attributes.title: We Love America - #78
attributes.caption: We also love Christmas. And marital aids. And Kentucky Bourbon. But mostly America.
attributes.description: We also love Christmas. And marital aids. And Kentucky Bourbon. But mostly America. This episode originally aired December 8, 2016 and is sponsored by MVMT Watches and Tipsy Elves

attributes.title: How to Orgy - #79
attributes.caption: Still not sure which is better and which is worse. Being the first guy to finish at an orgy or being the last guy to finish at an orgy. Feel free to discuss amongst yourselves.​
attributes.description: Still not sure which is better and which is worse. Being the first guy to finish at an orgy or being the last guy to finish at an orgy. Feel free to discuss amongst yourselves.This episode originally aired December 15, 2016 and is sponsored by MVMT WatchesTrunk Club

attributes.title: Rabbi Burnie Burns - #80
attributes.caption: When is Hanukkah? Why 8 candles and not 7? Why do the Jews keep stealing my geese? All good questions for your local rabbi.
attributes.description: When is Hanukkah? Why 8 candles and not 7? Why do the Jews keep stealing my geese? All good questions for your local rabbi.
